# removeAllAllocations()

**Instance Method**

Stages all the resources in the residency set to leave its list of allocations.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeAllAllocations()
```

## Discussion

Finalize the removal of these resource allocations, and all others changes you stage, by calling a residency set’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResidencySet/commit()] method.

## Removing allocations

- **removeAllocation(_:)**: Stages a single resource to leave the residency set’s list of allocations.
- **removeAllocations(_:)**: Stages multiple resources to leave the residency set’s list of allocations.
